channel.title: I need help with ..well....eveything on here:S
channel.description: i would like to try a powercutter for runescape tho all i see is scar and srl and stuff...what do i have to do to try one??

item.title: I need help with ..well....eveything on here:S
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Duderanch:

so as far as i understand now, scar is to create scripts for macro’s and stuff…and this forum is for people who make these programs themselves then i guess…i would just like to use them, im not so good in programming

No, Scar is the program that interprets the script, which runs it. Yes, you create scripts in Scar, but you also use it to run those scripts. It doesn’t create a program, yes you can make forms, but those are still within Scar.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with ..well....eveything on here:S

item.title: I need help with ..well....eveything on here:S
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:9, topic:142523”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=194976.msg1751908#msg1751908 date=1189642896]

so as far as i understand now, scar is to create scripts for macro’s and stuff…and this forum is for people who make these programs themselves then i guess…i would just like to use them, im not so good in programming

  1. Use search button
  2. Type in “power cutter”
  3. Search it
  4. Profit
    [/quote]

Yeah, that’s pretty much the 4 steps to becoming a leacher.[/quote]

  1. Go to school
  2. Study hard
  3. Buy a dictionary
  4. Take advanced courses.

Those are pretty much the 4 steps into learning to spell.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with ..well....eveything on here:S
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well for SCAR, download it here: http://freddy1990.com/scar.php

Then either look around the script section on these forums, or check out freddy’s forums I’m sure there must be some there.

When you download SCAR, press f1(I think?) for help.
